name: UI Project Plan Template with Design Thinking v2.11
description:
Starting a new project is always either fun or scary. A good UI project needs nice colours, fonts and spacing, but a great project needs Design Thinking.


That is why this template is based around the design thinking model and brings all the important sources of inspiration under one roof.


Simply follow the guide step by step and you are ready to present your design to clients, shareholders or your own team.


We have been using this proposal for our new UI projects at H&H WORKS and it's saved us so much time and energy. Clients love the simple design and you are free to change it as you wish.
